Item ID1193

The steel kiteshield is the fourth-best smithable kiteshield, requiring 5 Defence to wield. A player with 42 Smithing can make the shield by using three steel bars on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 112.5 Smithing experience.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-8-3
 Defence bonuses
+13+15+14-1+14
 Other bonusesSlot
